main: ^Luneta Park Is a historic urban park located in Manila, Philippines. It can also be referred to as Rizal Park, since it is where our national hero Dr. Jose Rizal was assassinated and was formerly known as Bagumbayan. It has monuments of famous Filipino heroes scattered in the area.

c-0: ^The park also offers numerous gardens for visitors to visit. This is the place where kilometer zero is located, it is used as a marker for distance reference when going to the different provinces and cities in Luzon Island and the rest of the Philippines.
